p: MDCK (NBL-2) cells were obtained from ATCC (Manassas, VA) and cultured in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) from Life Technologies (Carlsbad, CA) supplemented with 10% heat inactivated fetal bovine serum (Hyclone, Logan, Utah) and 100U/ml penicillin-streptomycin (Life Technologies, Carlsbad, CA). Influenza A viruses A/Hong Kong/8/68 and A/Puerto Rico/8/34 were purchased from Advanced Biotechnology Inc. (Columbia, MD).
